programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages MIDI in -odac -iadc ; -d -M0 ;;;RT audio I/O with MIDI in ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ;-o pindex.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ;Example by Anthony Kozar Dec 2006
instr 1 inum pcount index init 1 loop1: ivalue pindex index printf_i "p%d = %f\n", 1, index, ivalue index = index + 1 if (index <= inum) igoto loop1 print inum endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i1 0 3 40 50 ; has 5 pfields i1 1 2 80 ; has 5 due to carry i1 2 1 40 50 60 70 ; has 7 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
